about_the_game:
DESCRIPTION

Hop into the driver's seat of this modern old-school vehicle combat party game! DRIVE the fastest, DESTROY the competition, and DOMINATE.

  • Fight for victory alongside your teammates or alone in a variety of multiplayer game modes.
  • Reach the top of the global leaderboards across a variety of challenging Time-Trials.
  • Uncover the mystery of an abandoned haunted island alone or with friends.
  • Race through obstacles driving to the top of a seemingly impossible tower!
  • Level up to unlock different customization options for your Polycars such as skins, hats, speedometers, gliders and more!

EXCITING GAME MODES

Multiple game modes to either party up with friends or go alone!

  • FFA Deathmatch - 4 player free-for-all deathmatch, first to reach 15 wins!
  • Team Deathmatch - 3v3 deathmatch, first team to 25 wins!
  • King of the Hill* - 4 players fight to control the zone, first to control the zone for 1 min wins!
  • MOVA* - Level up your Polycars destroying players and enemy minions, first team to destroy all the enemy towers wins!
  • Time Trials* - Race through all the checkpoints and destroy the targets in a variety of maps. Top 15 fastest times are recorded on the global leaderboards.
  • Drive Up?!* - Hit the gas pedal and drift through obstacles on your way to the top! I wonder what's up there...
  • Haunted Hallows* - You become shipwrecked on a haunted island! Uncover the dark mystery alone or with friends, just don't get caught by the locals. Fix your ship or save the island, what will you do?

*See Roadmap image above for specific game mode release time-frame

ADDITIONAL FEATURES

Kit our your Polycar and take to the skies or hit the pavement with the power of Unreal Engine 5!

  • Equip unique offensive or defensive abilities and items for each Polycar
  • Level up the in-game battle passes to unlock awesome customization options!
  • Browse the in-game shop for exclusive seasonal items
  • Steam achievements for all game modes!
  • Remappable PC controls
  • Tutorials
  • Global leaderboards
  • Cross-play for future PC and Console platforms
  • Controller support
  • Customizable in-game license plate
  • Optimization for lower-end hardware

Community

  • Stay up-to-date on all Super Battle Polycar news over on the official Yooper Game Studios LLC discord channel
  • Ask the developer questions and give feedback with the Steam discussion forums!
  • Head on over to our YouTube channel for insider development videos and shorts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
